attributes.title: just awful.
attributes.review: I got this app because the app store has it rated as the #1 app for news. but it’s not. immediately upon opening the app i see the big orange man telling me to vote for him. PRESIDENTIAL HARASSMENT! and don’t even get me started on all the information they take. it’s worse than tik tok!! Once I got the app, they spammed me with emails and texts that would take too long to get rid of.

attributes.title: Literally garbage
attributes.review: I downloaded this app just to see what crap it even has (like why does the president need an app?) and immediately I opened it my phone just shut down. Just actually turned OFF. And it took 3 HOURS to turn back on, and that’s not even thE worst part, My phone had a VIRUS. Yup a virus. And I had to go and pay someone to get the virus out or whatever. Sooo WORST APP EVER 😡😡

attributes.title: This app horrible and scary        ❤️save TikTok ❤️
attributes.review: I was looking at it and reading and I saw TikTok was going to get banned right so I deleted the app and then I look at my apps I see this app again and I was like I thought I deleted so i powerd off my phone then look again my screen saver was Donald trump and I scream so loud the police came and took me into some place then they let me out

attributes.title: Tiktok🥰🌸
attributes.review: The Oompa Loompa of a president Needs to go bye bye when I open the app after downloading it asked me for all of this information(like number &email) I was like heck no I’m not doing that sorry not sorry cause I don’t him going through my phone I did some more digger and next thing the ✨ Presidents✨ nudes were on there and now I have to go to therapy for $100 a session 🤬 k bye✨🌸🦋🥰💜💗

attributes.title: Laggy and Slow! I do not recommend
attributes.review: I was very excited to use this app until I logged in and the app kept crashing. The loading screen takes a very long time to load and by the time it finally opens into the home screen I get bored. I do not recommend this app if you’re looking for a good American experience.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: do not get this app. it takes days to download and it destroys the battery life on your phone. i can’t even use my phone without having it plugged into a charger anymore. also it hacked my phone and started sending death threats to my friends. it kidnapped my cat and would have hurt her if i didn’t tweet donald trump and tell him that his hands are a regular size.

attributes.title: Tik Tok
attributes.review:
I’m sorry I don’t wanna be mean but I don’t understand how you can take away something that brings joy to so many people a lot of people also live if there tik tok income. This is not against your app I don’t know about it and I’m sorry you get so much hate I would just like to see tik tok not get banned! 
Thanks 🥰

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!!!!
attributes.review: This app took a disturbing amount of time to download (4 hours!) when I finally got it to download and logged into the app it was lagging like crazy. It caused my phone to crash to the point where I couldn’t use it AT ALL!!! This app Is garbage. If I could give it 0 stars I would. Absolutely waste of time to even try to download this app. It is garbage!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD WORST MISTAKE✨
attributes.review: i casually ran into this app and i downloaded it to see if it could change the way i felt about trump. This app took 14 days to download. took up a lot of space on my phone. STOLE my information. and it gave me this sketchy vibe all throughout. horrible app made me feel like i was being watched 😐😭 i say to look at the positive ✨💞🧚 but for this app i'll make an exception🧚

attributes.title: TERRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: after researching for numerous hours i’ve discovered that this app was actually a ploy to release all and any personal information you put out online or deleted from online. it also gives away your address, contacts, and it doesn’t only affect you but others around you as well. please, fit your own safety DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
